name: Yo My Yo!
description:
Yo My Yo! is a simplistic 2D racing game, in which the player must avoid collisions on the road during a given time. While it sounds easy, you will find yourself in very peculiar situations.

Key features of the game:

  • Partially random enemy spawn;
  • Unpredictable movement of some enemies;
  • Colorful 2D sprites based on the shapes of real cars;
  • Steam achievements;
  • Changing day and night cycle;
  • Finest rage-inducing experience.
